Connect With Us

Rose Lichtenfels

Associate Account Executive

Rose Lichtenfels is an Associate Account Executive for POLITICO Pro. Prior to joining POLITICO, she worked at Bully Pulpit Interactive, where she created digital advertising campaigns for top political, advocacy and Fortune 100 clients.

Lichtenfels received her Bachelor of Arts in political science and urban studies from Trinity College in Hartford, Conn. During her senior year of college, she worked as the youngest political reporter at the Hartford Courant, where she covered the Connecticut General Assembly. In 2012, Lichtenfels took a leave from Trinity to work as a field organizer for the Obama campaign in Iowa, winning 6/6 assigned precincts. She also interned at Hilltop Public Solutions in Washington, D.C.

Lichtenfels is most proud of her four years as an NCAA athlete and serving as two-time elected captain of the Trinity College women's varsity rowing team 2012-2014.  In 2014, Trinity had an undefeated spring racing season and went on to win the NCAA Division III national championship in Indianapolis.

While she is no longer in "NCAA shape," Lichtenfels still finds that the competitive work ethic learned through her collegiate rowing career is very useful on the Pro Sales team.

A D.C. native, Lichtenfels returned to the District after college and resides in Capitol Hill. She loves the intersection of business and politics and is thrilled to be a part of the POLITICO Pro team.

Rose Lichtenfels
rlichtenfels@politico.com

Contact Rose Lichtenfels
